thread.title: Bell's 1-yard TD run at buzzer lifts Steelers over Chargers
thread.title_full: Bell's 1-yard TD run at buzzer lifts Steelers over Chargers

title: Bell's 1-yard TD run at buzzer lifts Steelers over Chargers
text:
> Pennsylvania Bell's 1-yard TD run at buzzer lifts Steelers over Chargers The Pittsburgh Steelers celebrate defeating the San Diego Chargers in an NFL football game Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in San Diego. The Steelers won, 24-20. (AP Photo/Denis Poroy) iWitness7 is your chance to join the News Center 7 team! Upload your videos and photos and share with the entire WHIO-TV community!
